description: This file defines a React functional component 'Sidebar' that renders a navigation sidebar with links to different sections such as Overview, JIRA Projects, Confluence Pages, Connect Accounts, and an external API documentation link. It includes a nested 'NavItem' component to handle individual navigation items with active state styling based on the current pathname.

methods.name: NavItem
methods.description: A React component that renders a navigation link with active state styling based on current URL pathname.

methods.name: Sidebar
methods.description: The main React component that renders the entire sidebar with navigation links.
